# IKeyedItem&lt;T&gt; interface

Contract for classes which want to provide a unique key suitable for hashing

```csharp
public interface IKeyedItem<T>
    where T : IEquatable<T>
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | Type of key |
